attributes.action: Leave the EU and invite the rest of Europe to join the Pound Instead
attributes.additional_details: with the recent Euro zone crisis, we should leave the EU as we would not then be required to bail out other EU countries as their financial problems would may effect the global markets but not us specifically as we would not be in the EU and so the effect on our country would be significantly less. However, why not invite the rest Of Europe to join Us? those who are in debt would come to us and we would form a new organization with Great Britain as the glorious leader.
